column1: Dehloran (Persian: دهلران‎; also Romanized as Dehloran  is a city in and the capital of Dehloran County
column7: 787 families. The city lies along Road 64
column8: near the Iraqi border. A national natural monument lies in the north-eastern part of the city.  In Dehloran
column9: the Kurdish and Lur peoples make up the majority of the population.

column2: Arab and Lak people live in this city.
